Text:
Lovely, lovely.  Thanks for the ul!

A very frustrating series to follow with all the delays and such.  Was pleasantly surprised that Ellis finally completed what he started - given some of his recent series that he didn't complete.

Do you know if this torrent also includes that Planetary preview that appeared in two other Wildstorm titles?

it doesn't. i debated (inside my head) whether or not to put the preview, sometimes incorrectly called #0, in here... but because this is an HD set from Zone, i left that out. that's also why i didn't call this complete.

you can still find it, as well as two other .CBZs of trade paperback extras, here: http://thepiratebay.sx/torrent/5118734/
great contribution, thx for sharing this
you're all welcome. great book, even if it took cassaday 10 years
Fantastic series. STFmaryville, thanks for the up.
Any chance you can upload Ellis's run on The Authority in HD?
